name: libredesk
description: LibreDesk is a ticketing system that helps manage customer interactions, support issues, and service requests. Completely self-hosted, it features a clean dashboard, email integration, and user management tools.
features: Ticket Management: Support tickets, Issue tracking, Status workflows. Manage customer support efficiently.
Email Integration: Ticket creation from email, Email notifications, Unified inbox. Handle support via email seamlessly.
User Management: Customer accounts, Agent roles, Permission control. Organize your support team.
Dashboard: Ticket overview, Performance metrics, Activity tracking. Monitor support operations at a glance.
